headline: Viatris : Issues Statement on S&P Credit Rating Change
summary: PITTSBURGH - February 28, 2025 - Viatris Inc. today received notice that S&P Global Ratings downgraded Viatris' credit rating from BBB- to BB+ with a stable outlook. The Company's...
